text: Ni [mu sheng] dang xuandu yi qishi ni de jingdian [“gulanjing”], dang jin shou bai gong [zhu 1], yinwei bai gong dique neng zuzhi gan choushi he zui'e. An la [zai tianshimen mianqian] zanyang ni dique [bi ni zai bai zhong zansong ta] geng zhongda [zhu 2]. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la quan zhidao.
